1.title: Let's Meet the Healer
1.plot: In the fast paced urban jungle of Los Angeles Kristen Alexander, a holistic healer and intuitive is a beacon of light and hope. She takes us on an exciting and magical journey through the world of holistic healing and practices in and around Hollywood from Celebrities to everyday families.

2.title: I Can See Clearly Now
2.plot: Kristen works with a client that is slowly losing her eyesight. Amazing things happen when a holistic approach is applied and results are remarkable with verified independent medical tests that show a reversal of the condition.

3.title: The Impossible Becomes Possible..
3.plot: This big league sport celebrity had it all and lost it all. He takes the bold step to heal himself and mount a comeback with Kristen's holistic plan.

4.title: Healing the Housewives
4.plot: Being a housewife in this day and age is always a challenge, but when your a celebrity housewife your world can be turned upside down in a New York minute. We go along on a typical day in the life of The Heartbreak Healer and clear the slate of Hollywood's most famous housewife's to start the day anew..

5.title: Going to a Reiki Party..
5.plot: Holistic parties are all the rage of the Hollywood elite. Kristen puts on a Reiki party in the hills and the outcome will amaze you.

6.title: From Cali to Bali
6.plot: Kristen takes us to a healing resort on the island of Bali with a sports celebrity.

7.title: Heal the Force..
7.plot: Police Officers and Military Soldiers all over America are suffering from the affects PTSD Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. Kristen brings a holistic approach that shed light and hope in dealing with the reality of this condition.

8.title: Let's Take a Sound Bath..
8.plot: All of Hollywood is a buzz as more people are discovering the therapeutic benefits of a Sound Bath. Kristen and her crew perform a traditional Tibetan sound bath with gongs and sinning crystal bowls. Watch the transformation of the group as the bowls are played.

9.title: Catspaw
9.plot: Kristen gets a call to action to save her client's cat in the middle of the night.

10.title: Out of the Shadows and Into the Light..
10.plot: When therapy and rehab just don't work Kristen sets a up holistic recovery program for a music legend to finally overcome a decade long drug addiction.

11.title: And Along Came a Heartbreak..
11.plot: Kristen's holistic practice isn't just limited to Hollywood. She travels to Oklahoma to help restore shattered lives after a devastating tornado.

12.title: Falling Down
12.plot: Kristen gets the call to help a well known actor get his act together. After years of trying to mount a comeback he takes the holistic step to rebuild his career with Kristen's help and amazing things start to happen.

13.title: Ballot Box Blues
13.plot: Following the 2016 election the most frequent call that The Heartbreak Healer deals with on a daily basis is the anxiety felt by half the country. Kristen clams and helps her clients cope with the outcome.

imdb.plot outline: A broken heart comes in many forms from a relationship break up to the loss of a job or the passing of a family member or beloved pet. No one is a stranger to heartbreak.
imdb.title: The Heartbreak Healer
plot: A broken heart comes in many forms from a relationship break up to the loss of a job or the passing of a family member or beloved pet. No one is a stranger to heartbreak.::Patrick Weil
